Abstract: This study explores novel insights into the pathophysiology and treatment of valvular heart diseases, including rheumatic heart disease, aortic stenosis, mitral regurgitation, mitral stenosis, tricuspid regurgitation, and bicuspid aortic valve disease. Advances in molecular mechanisms and innovative therapeutic strategies are discussed, highlighting the potential for improved patient outcomes. Emphasis is placed on personalized medicine approaches and the integration of emerging technologies in clinical practice.
